casebody.data:
BRUNSON
v.
NC INNOCENCE INQUIRY COMMISSION, et al. 41P19-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 Jonathan E. Brunson, for Brunson, Jonathan E. Barry H. Bloch, Assistant Attorney General, for North Carolina Innocence Inquiry Commission, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of May 2019 by Plaintiff for Petition for Rehearing of Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."
